metadata.title: CVE-2016-3837 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: service/jni/com_android_server_wifi_WifiNative.cpp in Wi-Fi in Android5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-08-01 allowsattackers to obtain sensitive information via a crafted application thatprovides a MAC address with too few characters, aka internal bug 28164077.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
